task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 20 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create token bucket rate limiter using Redis to enforce 100 req/min for authenticated users and 20 req/min for anonymous
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create infra/rate_limiter.rs with: - struct RateLimiter { redis: ConnectionManager } - async fn check_rate_limit(key: &str, max_requests: u32, window_secs: u64) -> Result<bool> 2. Use Redis commands: INCR rate:{key}:{window}, EXPIRE if first request 3. Create api/middleware/rate_limit.rs: - Extract user_id from JWT or use IP address for anonymous - Apply limits: authenticated users 100/60s, anonymous 20/60s - Return 429 Too Many Requests if exceeded with Retry-After header 4. Integrate middleware into Axum router before auth middleware 5. Add rate limit headers to all responses: X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-20): Implement Redis-based rate limiting middleware

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Load test with >100 requests in 60s, verify 429 responses, test both authenticated and anonymous limits, verify Redis keys expire correctly
